001package ca.gc.cra.radar.logging;
002
003import ch.qos.logback.classic.Level;
004import ch.qos.logback.classic.Logger;
005import ch.qos.logback.classic.LoggerContext;
006import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
007
008/**
009 * Utility helpers for adjusting logging at runtime from CLI flags.
010 */
011public final class LoggingConfigurator {
012  private LoggingConfigurator() {
013    // Utility
014  }
015
016  /**
017   * Elevates the root logger level to DEBUG for the current JVM.
018   */
019  public static void enableVerboseLogging() {
020    LoggerContext context = (LoggerContext) LoggerFactory.getILoggerFactory();
021    Logger root = context.getLogger(org.slf4j.Logger.ROOT_LOGGER_NAME);
022    if (root.getLevel() != Level.DEBUG) {
023      root.setLevel(Level.DEBUG);
024    }
025  }
026}
